This article tests various special characters: @#$%^&*()_+-={}[]|:";'<>?,./

It also includes Unicode characters: emoji ğŸš€ ğŸ¯ ğŸ’¡ and accents cafÃ© naÃ¯ve rÃ©sumÃ©.

"Smart quotes" versus 'regular quotes' and em-dashes â€” like this â€” are also included.

The purpose is to ensure the CLI handles all text encodings correctly without breaking parsing or validation logic.
